mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, USER_KEY, BUSINESS_TYPE, DEVICE_CODE, PORT_CODE, PORT_INDEX, CTRL_SET_NAME, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, REMARK, (SELECT NAME FROM res_device WHERE res_device.DEVICE_CODE = res_user_port.DEVICE_CODE) AS DEVICE_NAME
mapper.select:
select
from res_user_port where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PORT_INDEX
select max(PORT_INDEX) from res_user_port where USER_ID = #{0}
mapper.insert: insert into res_user_port (ID, USER_ID, USER_KEY, BUSINESS_TYPE, DEVICE_CODE, PORT_CODE, PORT_INDEX, CTRL_SET_NAME, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctrlSetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update res_user_port

USER_KEY = #{userKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
